  • Reference

    Pie Plot

    Bior_PiePlot.Rd

    Create a Pie plot.

    Bior_PiePlot(
  x,
  labels,
  col = pal_d3("category20,", alpha = 0.7)(20),
  title = "",
  fontsize = 20,
  legend.key.size = 1
)

    Arguments

    x

    A vector of value

    labels

    A vector of labels for x

    col

    colour

    title

    title

    fontsize

    fontsize

    legend.key.size

    legend size

    Value

    A ggplot object

    Examples

    # Examples 1
x <- c(3,7,9,1,2)
labels <- c("A", "B", "C", "D", "E")
col <- c("#AEC7E8B2", "#FFBB78B2", "#98DF8AB2", "#FF9896B2", "#C5B0D5B2")
p <- Bior_PiePlot(x, labels, col=col, title="Test Bior_PiePlot")
p
